org.simplity.service

Class ServiceProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplity.service.ServiceProtocol

  • public abstract class ServiceProtocol
extends Object
    All names/Constants used for communication with the engine rg bhandi

      static String TIMED_OUT
      field name to indicate whether the session timed out, or user requested a logout
      static String TO_FIELD_SUFFIX
      suffix for the to-Field If field is "age" then to-field would be "ageTo"
      static String TOTAL_COUNT_SUFFIX
      if a sheet is paginated, server would return total count of rows in an additional field for the sheet name with this suffix
      static String TRACE_FIELD_NAME
      trace from server execution.
      static String USER_ID
      an authenticated user for whom this service is to be executed
      static String USSER_TOKEN
      typically the password, but it could be third-party token etc..

    • Field Detail

      • CHAR_ENCODING

        public static final String CHAR_ENCODING
        as of now, we are hard coding. we do not see a need to make it flexible..
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CSRF_HEADER

        public static final String CSRF_HEADER
        HTTP header with which to exchange CSRF token. sent by client with every request (except login) Returned by server on login/logut
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REMOVE_CSRF

        public static final String REMOVE_CSRF
        CSRF token value that indicates that the earlier value is invalidated. Typically after a logout operation

        Constant Field Values
